titleStmt.title: Cayphas and asked them what was prosylyte. And
Gospel of Nicodemus.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Poules chyrche yarde by me John Skot,
publicationStmt.date: In the yere of our lorde god. M.CCCCC.xxix. the .vi. day of Apriell.] [1529]

notesStmt.note: An edition of: The gospel of Nicodemus.
Title from first line of text, penultimate leaf of quire A.
Imperfect; lacks all before last two leaves of quire A.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
